entry.title: Newsletter #107
entry.content:
Hi there!

Tech Thursday has come again! We had a big event last week!

Our nerdy “managers” went to Berlin last week to participate in the Rocket Tech Summit 2015

He like to be that casual! It was a good talk though :)

Links? Here they are!

entry.title: Newsletter #48
entry.content:
Guess what? TechThursday is here!

What happened this week in the Namshi Tech team?

This week we achieved a great result: our travis builds now take just 8 minutes to run all the test suite, we are super excited about this.
We will soon talk about it in a blog post, stay tuned and keep following @TechNamshi

Enjoy the list of super uber interesting posts on the Web!

  • Zalando hits €1 billion in revenue in first half of 2014

  • Front-end performance for web designers and front-end developers, long but useful article by @csswizardry about web performance, a really hot topic now.

  • 3.14 things I didn’t know about CSS – a great presentation from CSS Day 2014

  • What’s the design process at Governement Digital Service in UK?

  • Want a sneak peek at the PHP language spec the @HipHopVM team has been working on?

  • How LinkedIn used PoPs and RUM to make dynamic content download 25% faster

  • Elasticsearch in 15 minutes

entry.title: Newsletter #41
entry.content:
Hi fellas, it’s #techThursday an here we are with the usual list of interesting topics and resources for the upcoming weekend!

We publish several blog posts in the latest weeks, to be up-to-date just follow us on twitter.

And you know what? We are hiring : we are looking for a Lead Mobile Developer!

  • Like Android & iOS? Let’s revolutionize shopping in the Middle East! We are hiring a mobile lead developer

  • Developers don’t write code, they write essays

  • How We Use Docker To Continuously Deliver Microservices

  • Boot2Docker: a lightweight Linux distribution made specifically to run Docker containers. Even on you OS X or Windows machine!

  • Meta-programming in JavaScript Using Proxies

  • New, Cost-Effective Memory-Optimized DB Instances for Amazon RDS

  • PHP 5.6.0beta3 Released

  • Konzole, a very simple tool to create console apps for #nodejs

  • A little of background to how Swift (the new programming language by Apple) development was started

  • Swift implementation of flappy bird, on github

  • The LLVM architecture

  • Samsung Tizen OS: 6 Things You Need To Know

  • Out in the open: the little-known Open Source OS that rules the Internet of things

  • Setup of isolated and decoupled dev environments

  • What Technology Should My Startup Use?

  • Categorized list of great web application/service including companies using it
